thread.section_title: Otticanet Recensioni| Recensioni dei clienti per Otticanet | www.otticanet.com
thread.title: Tara K.
thread.title_full: Otticanet recensione scritta da Tara K.

author: Tara K.
title: Tara K.
text: The ordering process was easy and the price was reasonable for high end glasses! They were shipped super fast to the US and the glasses were perfectly packed. There are other inexpensive brands out there, but I was looking for a specific pit of designer glasses and they had the best price. Their customer service was awesome as well, as I had to make a last minute change. I would definitely order from them again NMD recommend them.
